title: Notecard Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: JSON description of the card.location.mode API

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

mode.description: The GPS/GNSS connection mode. Will be continuous, periodic, or off

seconds.description: When in periodic mode, location will be sampled at this interval, if the Notecard detects motion

lat.description: The latitude in degrees of the last known location

lon.description: The longitude in degrees of the last known location

max.description: Maximum number of seconds to wait for a GPS fix
